Reviews.Title: “Absolutely not a four star Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Oli36
Reviews.Content: I had a five day family trip in Istanbul with my family. I was looking at some hotels on the Internet and Klas Hotel seemed very nice. I opted for an executive room for more room space and comfort. When we arrived we were welcomed at the reception and I can say that the welcoming was fairly ok even if there was no thorough explanation on the Hotel as it is usual to receive when staying in 4/5 star hotels. We went up to our room and it was then that we received the first shock. The room carpet was full of stains making the room looking filthy. The duvet and the pillow cases were also stained. The bed for one of my kids was not a bed at all, they just put two mattresses on each other and covered with a sheet and blanket. The balcony was filthy with cigarettes buds all over the place and the room was also smelling of cigarette smoke even if they tried hard to mask it with air freshner. The house keeping is terrible, they just made the beds and that was it. One day I had to request a sheet for my daughters improvised bed as they removed it and did not replace it back. The floor was never vacuumed cleaned during the whole stay, not allowing my kids to walk bare footed or even play on the carpet. Glasses and tea cups were also left uncleaned for the whole stay. It was advertised that bathrobes and slippers are available, but I still have no clue were these items were. On a four night stay, I had to call three times the reception to rectify things, the first time the service was prompt but as for the others I had to wait for 30 min to get things done. The positive things this hotel has to offer are masked by the poor quality they offer to clients. Location of this hotel is very good as you can reach almost everywhere by foot or by tram which is situated at a short walk away from the hotel. In general, I can say that our trip to Istanbul would have been perfect if it was not ruined by all the complaints mentioned above!

Reviews.Title: “City break”
Reviews.Author: GeomagsScotland
Reviews.Content: The Klas hotel situated in old Istanbul is ideally situated for visiting the main attractions eg. the Blue Mosque & the Topkapi Palace. The rooms are very comfortable & the breakfast was very good by Turkish standards.

Reviews.Title: “not impressed”
Reviews.Author: Jasminegrizzly
Reviews.Content: We just stayed at Klas Hotel last weekend. When we arrived they told us they where overbooked and they did not have a room for us. They offered us a room in the hotel next door which supposely should also be a 4 star hotel. So we agreed to move for two nights to hotel Oron which was just next door. We should have first asked to see the rooms. They hotel lobby is already a dark hole and the rooms are very old fashion and not really clean. After we especially booked Klas hotel so we can have some modern rooms, we ended up in this place. For our ast night in the Klas we got an upgrade to a deluxe room. Bathroom floor was soo sticky you could not walk in it barefoot. The walls are paperthin you here everything from next door. Also the staff are not that friendly and the music at breakfast was sooo loud you could not even talk to eachother......would not recommend Klas or even worse Oron hotel...the location is great...but there are many other hotels in that area.

Reviews.Title: “so so”
Reviews.Author: andreagiraud
Reviews.Content: This may be a 4 star by Turkish Standards but don't expect a real 4 star. The room was very small and stuffy. The staff were very friendly and there was a huge choice at the breakfast. It;s very close to the tram and a very short walk to the Grand Bazaar. I would definitely recommend this hotel as long as you don't expect a 4 star!!

Reviews.Title: “Good value hotel, not best location”
Reviews.Author: Imran I
Reviews.Content: The execuative rooms are very large and offer good value for money. The location (Laleli) is not the best part of town, but you can easily get to other parts using the Tram service.

Reviews.Title: “It's not a 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: Wilmo12
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff are very friendly and accommodating. We were first given a room with a standard double bed placed against the wall. The room is small even for a single person let alone two. We asked for a change of room and was told not until the next day when rooms would become available. We were able to move to a room of our choice with external windows rather than windows facing an internal courtyard with artificial lighting. Everything is really basic in this hotel, basic breakfast (the only thing good is the fresh salad and tomatoes), basic low quality toileteries, wall paper coming off the wall, very dim light fittings in the room, but it is clean. The location is not bad, as the tram line is not far. All in all if I go back to Istanbul, I would choose some other hotels!

Reviews.Title: “Good room and location”
Reviews.Author: rollingstone83
Reviews.Content: The location is convenient, a short walk to the tram which takes you to Sultanahmet (historic sites) and over the Galata Bridge to Beyoglu. I had a single room which was clean and cozy. The furniture was up to date and not an eyesore, which was a welcome surprise. The ceilings however, were oddly low, especially in my bathroom, and I noticed this despite being only 5'3". If you're a taller person the shower (that I experienced) would be quite tricky. A decent breakfast buffet is served every morning (beverages, omlettes, salads, bread, cereal, etc.)

Reviews.Title: “Very good price/quality & location”
Reviews.Author: Stanislav D
Reviews.Content: First of all very good location for visiting historical places of Istanbul, just few tram stops to Sultanahmet. Also it was very easy to get to the hotel form Ataturk airport. Hotel itself quite clean and quiet but I would prefer to have bigger room. Breakfast was fully ok (we are not very picky in food at the morning), lots of fruits which is mainly our morning menu. Staff were very helpful and gentle, very good English. Internet connection was good in room and in lobby, so I was able to use skype even from my phone. In general - very good price/quality and location.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for Istanbul visit”
Reviews.Author: mackgrey
Reviews.Content: Typical city hotel great for visiting Istanbul. Close to tram stop which takes you to all major attractions. Breakfast was the same every day but edible. Plenty of restaurants close by. Hotel staff friendly and hotel clean.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel , but nothing outstanding”
Reviews.Author: dragos05
Reviews.Content: The hotel was not that central , about a half hour walk to the Blue Mosque . Quite clean and quiet , but the room and bath we're extremly small . The breakfast was on the poor side , same food every day , and not that good or divers .

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was good and hotel driver was brilliant breakfast was good”
Reviews.Author: Yasin12m
Reviews.Content: I arrived there on 19th sept at 9pm. They didn't have my room ready due to a water problem and transferred us to sister hotel called Ameathyst. After a long flight I wasn't happy but due to my tiredness of my wife and daughter we agreed to trust the hotels manager and went there. We were very happy with this hotel for the night but on return to Klas hotel we were amazed by the staff and the hotel . It was excellent and a receptionist who spoke excellent English they provided us with all info we needed. Hotel was clean . Breakfast was good . Honest room maids. Excellent porters. Great experience and would stay there again. If any staff read this I thank you all very much

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL + LOCATION + STAFF + BREAKFAST!”
Reviews.Author: Jessica B
Reviews.Content: Everyone needs to go to Istanbul at least once in their lifetime! Klas hotel is great from arriving to departing. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful and make you feel welcome from the moment you arrive. They are extremely accommodating and handle every request with manners and sincerity. The hotel is in a very vibrant neighbourhood with many other hotels, shops, and restaurants that stay open well into the night which was great for us! Our room was beautiful and clean with modern decor and a huge washroom with a full shower. The breakfast took place on the bottom level and there is more than enough choices to eat and drink. I would recommend this hotel to everyone who is on a budget but wants some luxury for a few nights!

Reviews.Title: “Noisy if you get window outside”
Reviews.Author: jdneves
Reviews.Content: The hotel as a whole looks nice. At the reception people are friendly and receptive. Me and my wife stayed in this hotel for a weekend, in september, and was our first hotel in this trip to Turkey. We stayed at level A, between ground and 1st floor. This level has very low roof, not confortable for tall people (1,80+ m). We had the bad luck to have a room with window outside, right over some bars and restaurants, we could hear all the noise from there all night long. It was like if we were inside the bars, people talking loud, singing, laughing, music, etc, terrible. Only the next day they could transfer us to another room, much better regarding the noise. The room is small but ok. Has a refrigerator with lighs insides, and glass door, which make the entire room like day during the night. Breakfest was good, I only missed better juices.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for sightseeing”
Reviews.Author: Vikihalo
Reviews.Content: Clean, modern and spacious rooms, friendly staff and lovely rooftop area with good views. The breakfast buffet was plentiful and combined local and international options. Great location for city central sights (can walk in about 20 - 25 minutes or use the nearby tram stops) and walking distance to cafes, shops, the Grand Bazaar, restaurants and bars (about ten minutes). Free wifi and internet facilities.

Reviews.Title: “Fanastic staff and a great stay made our holiday worthwhile”
Reviews.Author: musa786
Reviews.Content: The staff were very helpful and polite. Breakfast was ideal. The rooms were fantastic, clean and a great location for everything within reach. We had a big balcony and the kids rooms had the biggest balcony overlooking a great scenery of Istanbul on the 5th floor!. Trams were a walk away which is ideal if you're with older children or couples. As we were with small children we always used to take taxi for our journeys. Special thanks to Hassan who helped us out he was a very nice man, also great thanks to hotel driver who spoke English well and gave recommendations on sites and shopping. The bell boy and desk staff not to forget Hakkan the main man who was very well spoken and a great gentleman. Tea and coffee making facilities was quite handy as we landed in the evening.The jacuzzi in the bathroom was great fun. My kids thoroughly enjoyed the swimming pool. Never got time for the sauna but would definitely have gone if we had time. I would recommend this hotel to family and friends. Istanbul is one of the greatest cities in the world and a must see.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT CITY TRIPPING HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: Culture-tripper
Reviews.Content: On our arival we were received by the receptionclerck whom spook english fluently. The room was small but very clean and equipped with a good kingsize bed, airco unit, flatscreen tv, and minibar. Breakfast was complete, with european white and brown bread, different kind of rolls and a gariture of cheeses, meat, jams , choco, honey , eggs tomatos etc... and very important very good coffee ( not turkish coffee) or the and chocolate milk at our choice. The service rendered by all personel that we met was outstanding, the hotel driver whom brought us to the ferryboat at yenkapi ( to badirma ) helped us out with our luggage and with the ferry formalities in turkish. He spook english with us on a very good level !

Reviews.Title: “Good location, lived the pool deck, but a bit shabby”
Reviews.Author: Perfect_Lady
Reviews.Content: We've stayed in Istanbul before, so wanted a similar hotel in the same area. Klas fitted the bill. BUT, we soon discovered; little to no hanging space for clothes, fittings falling away from the walls, bedroom window wouldn't close properly, air con broke down and so noisy we had to buy earplugs. The room was very badly laid out. Breakfast was horrible,fresh yoghurt was the best thing. You could only get fresh Orange juice by paying 6 tlr! It's only 2 on the street. Pool area was lovely, aside from the hardcore dance music playing from 10 am for the entire day.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service and Good Location”
Reviews.Author: belma02
Reviews.Content: The hotel was in a very good location, close to everything (restaurants, blue mosque, markets etc) and the rooms were quite nice not too small and it was very clean as well. The service from the receptionists was great especially ErgÃ¼n KemaloÄŸlu who was kind and always willing to help out and gave us good advice on sightseeing and things to do in istanbul. Other staff helped us with luggages and very friendly always greeting with a smile. Hotel also provided a buffet breakfast and food was always fresh and tastes amazing. I recommend this hotel for people who want to enjoy istanbul and have good service. We will deffinately be back! Thank you Belma and Sanela

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel, good location, noisy room”
Reviews.Author: ChucksPride
Reviews.Content: the room at the first glance seemed wonderful, nicely decorated, a/c running (which i hear is not the case in other hotels), tv, decent size bathroom, complimentary bottle of water. the staff downstairs was helpful. however after coming back to the room after a long day we discovered we were just above a very loud bar/caffe/restaurant (the room was on A floor facing the street). the music wouldnt stop untill about 1pm..with no earplugs sleeping would have been impossible. and thats with closed balcony door. so not a good option at all if you are trying to get some sleep. we were going to ask to be moved to another room but in the end decided we wouldnt bother with all that since we only stayed for 3 days and used earplugs anyway. im sure the hotel had other rooms facing other less noisy streets so if you book try to emphasize that. the location of the hotel was actually very good, just a few minute walk from the laleli tram station (convenient for going just about everywhere), or if you want to go on foot, grand bazaar is 5minutes away, and sultanahmet about 20 mins light stroll..all in all great location. istanbul is very clean, people are friendly and nice, but of course when using the public transport beware of pickpockets, a person from our group lost their wallet while on the tram. speaking of trams or getting around istanbul the ticket system is incredibly easy, there are english instructions on how to buy jetons/tokens everywhere, 1.75TRL for a single ride, you use the token and you go. we used metro to get from the airport to laleli station (we had to get off the metro and take tram to get to the hotel). taxi as we later learnt was quite cheap also(from taksim square to the hotel 10 TRL -night ride). the breakfast was very nice, the staff also very helpful, lots of fruits, cheese, and beautiful bread and bagels. great way to start a day before exploring the city. all in all, very nice but like i said , the sleep quality was poor due to the noise outside. if you dont plan on going to bed before midnight/1am disregard this. once past that i would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “All is well that ends well !!!”
Reviews.Author: kerrin g
Reviews.Content: We arrived July 15th to the news that your hotel was having water problems and that we would have to stay at your sister hotel, the Tilia. Needless to say, we were not thrilled with the idea especially since there was no pool at this address. We had chosen your hotel for your modern decor and your rooftop pool. The next morning, we left for a two week tour of Western Turkey. We sincerely enjoyed every aspect of your country from the natural to the man made sights, from the culinary delicacies to the warm hospitality of it's people. Before returning to Istanbul, for our last two nights in your hotel, we sent an email mentioning our initial disappointment and hoping for a better finale. We were truly very surprised upon check in when your front desk staff showed us to a beautiful suite. This was the icing on the cake that made a marvelous trip even more special ! By the way, we found your pool deck to be very comfortable and calming at the end of full day of discovery and shopping. We thank you again for making our stay so memorable. We will happily promote your wonderful country and your well appointed hotel to all our friends and fellow travelers...

Reviews.Title: “The service was friendly, the location was perfect and the pool.. amazing!”
Reviews.Author: MazRandall
Reviews.Content: I was delighted to be staying at Klas on my first every visit to Turkey. Traveling by myself it was so lovely to have such friendly staff at the front desk. They showed me the most amazing places to eat in Istabul, drove me there, organise the best table at the restaurant and then organise a car to pick me up. And it didn't end there.., they let me use their amazing pool roof top with my friends ( who were not staying there), showed me the local dry cleaning place and were generally helpful with any query or question I had about turkey. The rooms were clean and quant. The breakfast was good. But above all the service was exceptional providing an amazing welcome to Turkey. THank you I love it!

Reviews.Title: “Best home away from home in Istanbul !!!”
Reviews.Author: BaumeM
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Klas Hotel for 4 nights and it was excelent. Great value for money! Rooms are big enough, very clean and well appointed with a very modern design and large windows that you are able to open to enjoy the fresh air. Breakfast is a very wide selection of cold cuts, cheese, bakery fresh fruits and vegetables etc. You can find even a type of soup wich is very tastefull. Beautiful outdoor swimming pool on the roof terace. Complimentary Wi-Fi and a cup of turkish tea joined with cookies every day un the lobby bar starting 5 PM till 6 PM. Staff very friendly like all the turkish people that I meet in Istanbul. The hotel is well located 5 min walking from the grand bazar and 15 min from Blue Mosque and Saint Sophia. Modern and efficient tram public transportation available 3 min away. The hole Istanbul is full of very good restaurants one next to another and also you can find everywere quick fresh food like a doner or kebab made in front of you wich is very cheap and tasteful. I had an excelent experience choosing Klas Hotel !

Reviews.Title: “Klas Hotel-Not a Classy Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: 88takeiteasy
Reviews.Content: I believe the main thing that sets apart a hotel from another hotel is charm, and Klas hotel doesn't have any of it unfortunately. Let's start with check-in into this 3 stars (opps, it's really not a 4 star hotel please). You get a bell boy who drags your bags down the lobby steps when there's a ramp just by the side! If your bag wheels gets damaged, it won't be the best start to your holidays, would it. Next, when you check in, its your obligation to bring out all the paper work to show to them that your booking's made and what room you room you are signed up for. Then, they double check with their paperwork which is kept in the most horrendous falling to pieces plastic file you can ever imagine! And if there's any reservation matters to be clarified, you have to wait for Ms Tamara Gorkova to come in to work and you then have to bring your case forwards to her. It doesn't matter if you have business to attend/ a city tour to join-you have to be there while Ms Tamara is working during her office hours. Nobody else ca attend to your query. And despite their clearly stated 24 hours cancellation policy, if you've booked 5 nights in a row, and you decide to check out earlier, its money down the drain because its ONE booking. So, next time, remember to make 5 separate 1 night bookings if you still want to go to Klas (not classy) hotel. Their rooms being small is the understatement of the year-bend down to pick up that soap you dropped in the shower, and you are going to bring the shower plastic walls down! And there's this big sign on the mineral water they provide you-ONLY 1 BOTTLE FOR EACH STAY. It doesn't depend how long you stay there, and when my son tried filling up the bottle during breakfast, he received a gruff telling off by the cafe captain-where's the charm, man? You did go to Hotel School/Uni didn't you, Mr Captain?The only thing Ms Tamara is good at would be to write a retort to this letter which I am sure she will. The funny thing is I sent off 5 Trip Advisor messages to the last 5 reviewers asking more details about Klas Hotel before I made a booking, and guess how many replies back I got?-ZILCH! Doesn't it make you wonder?-That's a line from a Led Zepellin song, isn't it? So, don't take that stairway that leads to Un-Klassy Hotel! The front desk staff(Mr You-Must-Meet-Ms-Tamara-Yourself-Tomorrow 9.30am to 5 pm) even had the nerve to show me Klas Hotel's full name and address when I said this unpleasant stay is going up as a review on Trip Advisor.

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel placed near popular areas”
Reviews.Author: diddelido
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay very much and we've got very good service from staff. We got in late and got a double-bed room after spending one night in a twin bed room although we were booked for twin room, Very good. Room was very clean and fresh, Beds are a little bit hard (i believe we scandinavians are used to more soft beds). Information & Service very good. I am very satisfied with the value of our booking, very price-worthy hotel in a great location. I would definitely be able to recommend Klas Hotel to any of my friends. Staff was always friendly and we certainly enjoyed our trip to the airport by one of your drivers who where very nice to us. - The pool area on the roof (which looked great) had not opened for the season.

Reviews.Title: “Absolute Nightmare!!”
Reviews.Author: FifiSousse_Tunisia
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Klas hotel for the easter holidays, and was disappointed by everything, the location of the hotel was about 10 minutes away from all the top attractions, but the hotel staff made out that everything was far away and needed a taxi to go everywhere, two of the hotel staff quoted us different prices for their tour package, on both occasions we felt like the staff were trying to make their own profit, then the hotel transfer from the airport was a complete rip off!! local taxi's will take you for 20 euros but the hotel manager quoted us 35 euros, the breakfast was terrible every morning the same layout and food and looked like nothing had been moved from its place!! we definelty did not enjoy our stay or recommend this hotel to any of our friends.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place”
Reviews.Author: redwine88baby
Reviews.Content: It was really a good choice, great value of money, the staff is friendly and service was good, If i would go to istanbul, i would stay in the klas hotel again

Reviews.Title: “The choice of Klas Hotel**** was a coincidence, but turned out to be a pure bargain...”
Reviews.Author: utkik
Reviews.Content: When googling for a bed in downtown Istanbul about a week prior to my three nights stay in this huge and unfamiliar city I hade absolutely no idea what to look for. So I decided to send a few mails at random to some of the "anonymus" hotels I found. So it must have been my lucky day, because Klas HotelÂ´s Sales Manager Ms. Tamara Gorkova sent me the nicest reply and upon arrival she appeared to welcome me personally with some refreshments in spite of extremly busy hours. The stay itself proved to be just as fine, since I had quite busy days the hotel had to be my calm and luxury oasis in the desert. The room itself was maybe a bit small but quite okay for resting and sleeping, (and thanks God for the huge king size bed that occupied most of my room, that was an absolute favourite and I was extremly pleased with it :-). The room-maid (I never saw her or him) kept it clean for me and brought me new towels every day. It was not really needed, but indeed excellent service. She or he also filled up my free supplies of teas, coffees and mineral water as much as needed. Let me also give some credit to the staff at the front desk where I spent time checking my mails at a courtesy customer-computer. Same friendly faces met me every day with a personal greeting and a little chat, immediately ready to assist when asking for directions of places of interest, trams, busses and stores when preparing for a few hours out in the nearby shopping-district on my last day before flying home. Klas Hotel is actually quite convenient located, only some 10 minutes by foot to the well-known Aksaray Metro- and Bus Station). And that goes for everybody I met at Klas Hotel, they all were very gentle, hospitable and friendly... and I definitely would like to include also the breakfast-staff in the restaurant. Very helpful and service-mined. I spent almost an hour every morning enjoying the hotelÂ´s breakfast-buffet offering lots of goodies for every taste, like lots of fresh fruit of all kinds, different cheeses and sausages, bread and pastries, juices etc etc etc, you name it ;-))). IÂ´be very happy to visit Klas Hotel again if I ever return to Istanbul, and I will certainly be happy to give my fiends and collegues my "secret tip" when recommending Klas Hotel as a nice and friendly hotel in an attractive location of Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Celil_Camoglu
Reviews.Content: I had an unforgettable night at Klas Hotel, the service, hospitality and cleanliness was perfect I would never hesitate to recommend the Klas Hotel to anyone if you care of your health and comfort and also if you look for sincere, you can make you feel yourself at home !

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel for city trip”
Reviews.Author: stellajimmy
Reviews.Content: Breakfast was magnificent, staff was really helpful and the location was superb, near all sights and public transportation.

Reviews.Title: “To have a wonderful tripo in Istanbul stay at the Klas Hotel”
Reviews.Author: musedart
Reviews.Content: Very good located, with kindness emloyees, very clean room and bathroom, the Klas hotel is near all the most important touristic attraction... you can walk to go to this marvellous touristic attractions : the Bazar, st. Sofia Basilica, the Blue Moske, the spices Market...

Reviews.Title: “Hotel can definitely be recommended”
Reviews.Author: comcam
Reviews.Content: The hotel in general is nicely and conveniently located on the European side, close to the university and the grand bazar, among other decent hotels. The "employee of the year" welcomed us friendly and openly, he was also helping us with a room uprate for better business convenience. The room was nicely and stylish arranged, offering spacious and comfortable atmosphere. The facilities of the hotel were standard and ok, however it was a pity that the roof terrace was generally closed. The Service was very friendly and taking care of concerns and demands professionally and quietly - a good experience! Due to construction sides in the area the noise level was higher making phone calls in the room more difficult, however it seemed to be "a gentlemen's agreement"- or simply a regulation - that major heavy machines only started around noon. Hotel can definitely be recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff and clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: Lin009
Reviews.Content: Enough space in the room, nearby shops and restaurants but quiet inside the room. Clean and luxury room and hotel. Good breakfast with enough choice. Very kindly staff. We can recommend this hotel to everyone! W Bosma L Vaals

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - awful bed”
Reviews.Author: OzzieLad78
Reviews.Content: Booked this hotel via late rooms, so got a good price. Fantastic service that is willing to always help, good breakfast with the widest variety of food during my stay in Turkey. Rooms were on the tad small side, but the bed was rock hard and no duvet was provided just a blanked which did detract from the experience.

Reviews.Title: “very nice”
Reviews.Author: didido
Reviews.Content: good hotel close every import touristic place, the staff and the food are excellent. The staff at the hotel takes care very much, friendly and is available for questions with pleasure.The price / achievement relation is right. Generously and brightly. Cleanly. The hotel lies centrally and in nevertheless quiet situation. Good starting point for inspections, boat trips, town wanderings etc. everything lies in comfortable walk nearness. There is streetcar and cafÃ©s and restaurants as well as a supermarket as well as late purchase immediately next door

Reviews.Title: “Very nice Hotel with a high quality service.”
Reviews.Author: YanYana
Reviews.Content: Hello everybody. All I can tell regarding this very nice Hotel is that I really enjoyed my time there, no complains at all. The hotel is clean with new design rooms, which are very comfortable and cozy. Breakfast always nice and fresh. The location is just perfect, close to historical places. And price is good for quality. Choose this Hotel and you won't be disappointed for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Holidays :-)”
Reviews.Author: BernaKandil
Reviews.Content: the place of hotel was great .its close to tramway .its close to sultanhamet 10 minutes and the rooms are very comfortable. staff is so hospitable they interested with us. breakfast was very good we will come again and we advice to our friends :-)))) Berna Kandil

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Klas is perfect”
Reviews.Author: kandou
Reviews.Content: Hello I am Sana From Tunis I present you all the best wishes for year 2011 Thank you for your welcome so warm which will remain to engrave in my memory Thanks to every person who welcomed me with a beautiful smile and a good service that I will never forget it, I stayed one week with my mother, it was a perfect week and if somebody will suggest me to make another journey I shall choose without hesitation ISTANBUL and I shall live only in Hotel Klas for this reason I want to cross a big THANKS to all the persons who work in Hotel Klas and try to satisfy the customers. Sana From Tunis

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in Istanbul, very highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: haltaiar
Reviews.Content: I am very delighted and lucky to spend few days at your great hotel in Laleli/Istanbul. I really liked everything in the hotel. Staff reception is great and meals are nice.Room services are very good. Security is outstanding It deserves a 7 star rating I definitely would recommend it to all people. Have a happy new year.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel is good to stay”
Reviews.Author: NickAnderson1111
Reviews.Content: Like; The price is very good for a people who want to lower their traveling cost. Free sona Room is clean Staff are very handy, the manager Hasan is really eager to solve my traveling questÄ±ons do not Like; The area is little bit noisy for ppl who need quiet sleep Bathroom is kind of small

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: JeffBrid
Reviews.Content: We really had a great time at the Klas Hotel! The location was great for exploring the Grand Bazaar, Spice market and Sultahmet. The room was delightful, decorated with style and charm, and made to feel like a home away from home. Staff typical of turkish hospitality they went above and beyond in assisting us with suggesting sites and tours and ensuring that we had the best experience of Istanbul and its people. The manager was also a fantastic - even remembered our names after staying there one day. Free internet is available for guests, and shuttle service from the airport if you stay more than 3 nights. This hotel provided a great experience for us during our stay in Istanbul. We had a great time and would definitely stay there again!!

Reviews.Title: “Thank you very much for a nice rest and wonderful service”
Reviews.Author: kanatsiz
Reviews.Content: I visit Istanbul every year 5-7 time and it was a big problem for me to find really nice hotel according to my budjet. Last time my friend reccomendet me to stay in KLas hotel and it was really rigth choice. After that in Istanbul for me there is just one hotel - Klas hotel. Thanks for all staff.

Reviews.Title: “The Best hotel in old city of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Feras73
Reviews.Content: I have strong experience with Klas hotel as I accommodated 2 groups in this hotel, first group was on med of Sep 2010 (24 rooms) for 7 nights and the next group was on med of Nov 2010 (26 rooms) for 6 nights. Really I was worry before check in as I booked this hotel throw travel agent in Doha and it was the first time for me and for my business group in this hotel , but I was very happy got many things there , the most of these things: 1- Good welcome, and they try to give us our rooms before 14:00 as we reach early at 09:00 morning , so most of us got the rooms around 10:00 am as we were so tired. 2- The rooms was very clean and I believe much better than some 5 stars hotels in Istanbul, some of these was small rooms but it's ok as single rooms. 3- Daily we had meeting , the arrangements was great and on time, then the lunch was on time and was more than enough. 4- Breakfast was rich. 5- The Location was good, 300 M to tram station and you can move by it to any where in Istanbul with less than 2 USD only, Blue mosque around 1 KM far only , and you can go to airport by metro from there . 6- Someone of my group was feeling not ok, the hotel management called the Doctor and he came with 20 min to us, it was good service from them. 7- Hotel good for families and others also as good and safe place.

Reviews.Title: “best of best klas otel”
Reviews.Author: SALMAN1976
Reviews.Content: the first location very good.hotel is wonderfull.and doorman and bellboy very warm friandly, receptions mrs dÄ±lek and mrs hasan very helpfulled.mrs tamara Ä± m so thanks for you for your help.the foods very delicious open buffet breakfast very good. room comfortable number one goog quality ..thanks for all staff. so next summer see you soon.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Experience Ever!”
Reviews.Author: HusseinShamji
Reviews.Content: I booked Hotel Klas online about two months before my trip to Istanbul and printed out the confirmation note. My wife and I arrived in Istanbul from Tajikistan having barely slept and made our way to the hotel through the cold and rainy day. We were tired, cold, hungry and had only two days in Istanbul to do the sights. So our plan was to shower, freshen up and head out. When we arrived at the hotel, they sit us down, give us a welcome drink and then lay it on us; the LIE they told us was that some of their floors had been damaged and they would have to shift us to another hotel and that there was no space for us! This after I had booked over two months ago! They didn't agree to show us the actual damage, and I noticed other guests being checked in. This was a complete scam! What they do is the following: they take all the bookings and then only honour the ones who booked for higher prices (the prices per room kept going up after I had booked). This is not unique to us but to other people as well. The hotel they took us to was much further out and not at all a four star hotel. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone! For a hotel called "KLAS" they have no class whatsoever!

Reviews.Title: “Charming and beautiful hotel”
Reviews.Author: irusha
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Klas Hotel in july this year and were very impressed with the cleanliness and the staff who were all very helpful and friendly. We had really amazing holidays:) The hotel itself is great located, very clean and activities very organised. Will recommend this hotel to my friends and for sure will be back there next year :):):)

Reviews.Title: “wonderful hotel”
Reviews.Author: amr_Leo78
Reviews.Content: I would like to share my experience as a guest for Klas hotel - Istanbul. I spent a weekend at the beginning of August in the hotel together with my wife. Since i enter the lobby i felt the cozy atmosphere, the friendliness and politeness of the reception staff and I thought that my vacation will be a pleasant one :) And it was really like that - when I entered my room - wow, it was amazing, decorated in latest fashion, spacious and very comfortable. My wife spent the afternoons at the roof pool, which had a magnificent panoramic view over the city. The breakfast was delicious and variable. Every day I found our room cleaned on time...So what else I can say - a marvelous hotel in a marvelous city. I enjoyed walking all day along the crowded streets of the cosmopolitan Istanbul, and I enjoyed the comfort I had when I came back to the hotel. What I can say - I will recommend this place to all my friends traveling to Istanbul on business or in vacation. It's a really great place. Well done, and keep doing this good job! Your friend: Amr

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY AT THIS HOTEL!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: MakeupBase
Reviews.Content: We arrived at approx 4am on a Sunday morning only to be told they had given our room to someone else despite our confirmed booking. We were told we had to go to an alternative hotel for the night, bearing in mind we were travelling with a 3 year old and an 11 month old baby!!! They failed to provide transport for us and expected us to walk with our babies and 3 suitcases. We arranged our own transport there only to find we had to wait another hour for our room to be prepared. The tiny room we were given only had 2 single beds for the 4 of us with no cot either! the next day we returned back to hotel Klas, missing breakfast and had to wait until approx 5pm for a suitable room to be allocated to us, which was a total waste of the day. The rooms they kept showing to us were so small for the 4 of us with travel beds and mattresses on the floor instead of proper beds which we had paid for!!! There were no apologies, the staff were arrogant, non helpful with a miserable and rude demeanor. They tried to charge us for items we had NOT consumed at the mini bar and telephone calls we had NOT made. Every day we witnessed many dissatisfied customers who were complaining and also extremely disatisfied with the service, this re-inforced the fact that this hotel does not operate as a 4star hotel but instead as a 2star, I have travelled to many places and stayed in many hotels and never have we been treated so badly, I would reccomend to anyone reading to avoid this hotel at all costs if not your holiday could be seriously ruined as ours was. (by the way what they call a swimming pool is actually the size of an enlarged bath!)

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: gilltaylor684
Reviews.Content: We arrived at midnight to find our booked delux room not ready so had to use a standard room which was small but spotless. the next day as promised we were moved to our delux room however the air con wasnt working I have to say the staff were wonderfull and did everything they could to rectify the problems we were given another room where everything was as good as promised. the rooms were all clean and the beds very comfortable. I would like to make special mention of Hussian who made our stay as pleasent as possible, he made reservations for us ordered taxis, and went out of his way to be helpfull. thank you hussian and if I have misspelt his name I am sorry. I have one suggestion Please put rubbish bins in the rooms as well as the bathroom. thank you to all the staff who were plesent and helpfull I would recommend this hotel to anyone going to Istwnbul. My only downside was didnt like the breakfast room but thats beacuse I dont like windowless rooms

Reviews.Title: “excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: papou71
Reviews.Content: Klas hotel has an excellent quality of services. the staff is very professional and very helpful, they all speak english. the location of the hotel is close to the main touristic sites you can visit all of them walking and just down the street you can find the tram stop. it's very easy to visit istanbul and find your way back to the hotel. the room was always very well cleaned, the breakfast menu was very rich and diversified. my stay at the hotel was a very nice one. it's an experience i gladly renew. the hotel really diserves his four stars.

Reviews.Title: “CLASSY HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: saqibrehman80
Reviews.Content: Me and my 3 friends travelled to Istanbul from Norway in June 2010. We were originally going to stay at a hotel called grand ant hotel, however very soon after arriving we were sure our vacation would be ruined if we stayed there for the whole week. After staying there for one night we looked at hotels in the area that had high standard and that were affordable. KLAS HOTEL met our criterias so we went there to have a look around and decided to check-in immediately. We were met by their really friendly sales manager who is fluent in English. She sat us down and gave us the need/nice to know information about the hotel while we were sipping the tasty welcoming drink. Our baggage was taken care of by the staff and we got to choose between to different types of rooms. We paid about 90 dollars for one night for a room with 2 seperate beds. It really is value for money when you look at the whole package. The service is excellent, the rooms are clean, modern and tastefully designed. Aircondition doesn't make any noise, every room has free bottles of water, tea and coffee. Flatscreen Tv has many channels to choose from. You can sunbathe or cool off in the swimmingpool at he roof of the hotel. There is also a Sauna if you need to get warm and sweaty, however more suitable for the colder climate. Hotelguests are highly recommended to ask the the receptionist to book a table at the Panoramic Restaurant. Guests at Klas Hotel get free taxi to this restaurant, which is placed on a roof-top, serves delicious food and the view is so amazing that it will last in your memory forever. Klas Hotel is by far the best hotel I've stayed at and I've been promoting it to my friends ever since returning from my trip to Istanbul, without any personal gain of course. Try Klas Hotel. You will not regret it.

Reviews.Title: “Not as Expected”
Reviews.Author: tripriyadh
Reviews.Content: Iam currently writing from my room A-1. Unfortunately, after many reviewes to select the best hotel, I have selected Klass which was not up to my expectation. Iam not from a demanding -type of persone. However, the staff there were soo rude and un-helpful. Although the room and toilete waere clean, the daily cleaning was not perfect. Our room was not vaccumed at all during the 6 days. The aircondition was off-service for couple of hours and staff were rude in helping to rectify the problem. There is disco nearby and very noisy at night

HotelInfo.Name: Klas Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Harikzedeler sokak No 48 | Laleli, Istanbul 34470, Turkey
